thread.title: U.S. Wins Gold in Men’s Curling

author: Jonathan Cheng
title: U.S. Wins Gold in Men’s Curling
text:
In a Pyeongchang Olympics that has seen its fair share of twists and turns at the curling center, Saturday brought one more: The U.S. men’s curling team defeated Sweden in the finals to bring home a ninth gold medal for Team USA.
Playing before a rowdy American crowd that included U.S. first daughter Ivanka Trump and White House press secretary Sarah Huckabee Sanders, skip John Shuster placed a perfect double-takeout on the final throw of the eighth end to score five points for Team USA—and put the team in position for the...
